name: Project: [REDACTED]
description:
Journey through unfamiliar lands and discover your past in this platformer game!

A downloadable game for Windows and MacOS     

< [ Download link below! ] >

You wake up in a strange, unfamiliar land with no memories of who you are...

Your only clue to solving this mystery lies in a series of books written by an unnamed author. They appear to document events and progress surrounding a mysterious 'Project: [REDACTED]', but just what is this project and how will it help you uncover your past...

  • Narrative driven platformer
  • 24 levels to explore
  • 5 music tracks (each for a different location)
  • Roughly 45 minutes of gameplay

To install the game, simply download the build for your device, extract the zip file and open the 'Project [REDACTED]' application inside!
